source.9e128701:
ConfirmedCases = train["ConfirmedCases"].groupby(train['Date']).sum()
df = pd.DataFrame(ConfirmedCases)
df.plot(kind='bar', color="red")
plt.show()
source.e997b528:
ConfirmedCases = train[train["Country_Region"]=='China']["ConfirmedCases"].groupby(train['Date']).sum()
df = pd.DataFrame(ConfirmedCases)
df.plot(kind='bar', color="red")
plt.show()
